prompts: Create a laid-back Pokemon that loves to lounge around and take it easy in the forest.
Show me a massive Normal-type Pokemon with a shaggy coat and a playful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies laziness but is surprisingly strong when provoked.
Generate a friendly, large Pokemon that enjoys leisurely naps in grassy fields.
Design a Pokemon with a big, fluffy beard and a relaxed personality, perfect for the mountains.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a giant gorilla but is too lazy to fight unless necessary.
Give me a sleepy Pokemon that prefers to chill in urban areas, away from all the action.

distinctive_features: Short gray hair on top of the head
